text.#text:
In order to ensure that this section is carried out in a manner consistent with the twenty-seventh
			 article of amendment to the Constitution of the United States, the payroll
			 administrator of a House of Congress shall release for payments to Members
			 of that House of Congress any amounts remaining in any escrow account
			 under this section on the last day of the Congress during which the
			 amounts were deposited in such account.
